metadata.synopsis: The statues comment on the player's success in the chess puzzle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to  - S_WYR_Chess_Box - c8b6f0eb-22b9-4594-9029-988b873dd764 - (-838 20 -962) in BGO_Main_A, then destroy the blank king (S_WYR_Chess_King1_cd2393b5-fccc-4e0f-8592-16f85f078edf).

0.speaker: GROUP_Act3_WYR_WyrmwayAnnouncer
0.text: The black king has fallen. May you always crush the wicked, be they pawn, knight, or monarch. Proceed.
